name: match 5 Challenger
description:
Match 5 is one of the most fun and challenging puzzle games, it's the game you would play for years and never get bored. 

With an emphasis on the high score, we bring you a worldwide cross-platform leaderboard this time. (web version don't have leaderboard)

mac version : https://itunes.apple.com/us/ap...

ios version: https://itunes.apple.com/us/ap...

android version: http://luxfinalspark.com/app/m...

How to play:
The aim of the game is to prevent the board from filling up by strategically aligning 5 gems of one color into a vertical, horizontal or diagonal line which will instantly disappear. 
Gems can move only if there is a clear path to its destination.

http://game.luxfinalspark.com/...
